verses.verse: <S%H1945>"Ho!<s%> <S%H3605>Every<s%> <S%H3605>one<s%> who <S%H6771>thirsts,<s%> <S%H1980>come<s%> to the <S%H4325>waters;<s%> And you <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H369>have<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> <S%H1980>come,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> and <S%H398>eat.<s%> <S%H1980>Come,<s%> <S%H7666>buy<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> and <S%H2461>milk<s%> <S%H3808>Without<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> and <S%H3808>without<s%> <S%H4242>cost.<s%>

<S%H4100>"Why<s%> do you <S%H8254>spend<s%> <S%H3701>money<s%> for what is not <S%H3899>bread,<s%> And your <S%H3018>wages<s%> for <S%H7654>what<s%> does not <S%H7654>satisfy<s%>? <S%H8085>Listen<s%> <S%H8085>carefully<s%> to Me, and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H9185>what<s%> is <S%H9185>good,<s%> And <S%H6026>delight<s%> <S%H5315>yourself<s%> in <S%H1880>abundance.<s%>

<S%H5186>"Incline<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> and <S%H1980>come<s%> to Me. <S%H8085>Listen,<s%> that you may <S%H2421>live;<s%> And I will <S%H3772>make<s%> an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with you, [According to] the <S%H539>faithful<s%> <S%H2617>mercies<s%> shown to <S%H1732>David.<s%>
<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> him a <S%H5707>witness<s%> to the <S%H3816>peoples,<s%> A <S%H5057>leader<s%> and <S%H6680>commander<s%> for the <S%H3816>peoples.<s%>

<S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> you will <S%H7121>call<s%> a <S%H1471>nation<s%> you do not <S%H3045>know,<s%> And a <S%H1471>nation<s%> which <S%H3045>knows<s%> you not will <S%H7323>run<s%> to you, <S%H4616>Because<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> even the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%> For He has <S%H6286>glorified<s%> you."
<S%H1875>Seek<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> while He may be <S%H4672>found;<s%> <S%H7121>Call<s%> upon Him while He is <S%H7138>near.<s%>

Let the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H5800>forsake<s%> his <S%H1870>way,<s%> And the <S%H205>unrighteous<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H4284>thoughts;<s%> And let him <S%H7725>return<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> And He will <S%H7355>have<s%> <S%H7355>compassion<s%> on him; And to our <S%H430>God,<s%> For He will <S%H7235>abundantly<s%> <S%H5545>pardon.<s%>
"For My <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> are not your <S%H4284>thoughts,<s%> <S%H3808>Neither<s%> are your <S%H1870>ways<s%> My <S%H1870>ways,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"For [as] the <S%H8064>heavens<s%> are <S%H1361>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> are My <S%H1870>ways<s%> <S%H1361>higher<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> your ways, And My <S%H4284>thoughts<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> your <S%H4284>thoughts.<s%>

"For as the <S%H1653>rain<s%> and the <S%H7950>snow<s%> <S%H3381>come<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> And do not <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H3588>without<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H7301>watering<s%> the <S%H776>earth,<s%> And making it <S%H3205>bear<s%> and <S%H6779>sprout,<s%> And <S%H5414>furnishing<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> to the <S%H2232>sower<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> to the <S%H398>eater;<s%>

<S%H3651>So<s%> shall My <S%H1697>word<s%> be <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3318>goes<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from My <S%H6310>mouth;<s%> It shall not <S%H7725>return<s%> to Me <S%H7387>empty,<s%> <S%H3588>Without<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H6213>accomplishing<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> I <S%H2654>desire,<s%> And without <S%H6743>succeeding<s%> [in the matter] for <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H7971>sent<s%> it.

"For you will <S%H3318>go<s%> out with <S%H8057>joy,<s%> And be <S%H2986>led<s%> <S%H2986>forth<s%> with <S%H7965>peace;<s%> The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> will <S%H6476>break<s%> <S%H6476>forth<s%> into <S%H7440>shouts<s%> of <S%H7440>joy<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you, And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6086>trees<s%> of the <S%H7704>field<s%> will <S%H4222>clap<s%> [their] <S%H3709>hands.<s%>

<S%H8478>"Instead<s%> of the <S%H5285>thorn<s%> <S%H5285>bush<s%> the <S%H1265>cypress<s%> will <S%H5927>come<s%> up; And <S%H8478>instead<s%> of the <S%H5636>nettle<s%> the <S%H1918>myrtle<s%> will <S%H5927>come<s%> up; And it will be a <S%H8034>memorial<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> For an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H226>sign<s%> which will not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> <S%H3772>off.<s%>"
